full_summary:
#. [PR1291-W6509-230056 - Transportation Case](url)
 -------
- **Solicitation Number (Numéro de la sollicitation)** : WS3763180004
- **Amendment Number (Numéro de modification)** : 1
- **Publication Date (Date de publication)** : January 17, 2023
- **Closing Date and Time (Date et heure de clôture)** : February 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
- 
**Procurement Details**

* **Solicited Goods and Service (Articles et services demandés)**: Rigid transport case
* **Location of Delivery (Destination de livraison)**: Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada
* **Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux)**: 
  • North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
  • Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method (Methode d'approvisionnement)**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria (Criteres de selection)**: Lowest Price
**Contact Information**

- **Contracting Authority (Autorité contractante)**: 
  • Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  • 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Point of Contact (Point de contact)** : Philippe Montpetit
  • Address: Not Available
  • Email: philippe.montpetit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  • Phone: Not available
  • Fax: Not available
**Background**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of rigid transport cases for the storage and transportation of specialized equipment. The bid must include delivery to Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada. 

**Submission Requirements**

All bidders must submit required documentation and bids at the latest by the specified closing time on February 7, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. Bids received after this time will not be accepted.

Please click [on this link (url)]For details on this procurement opportunity.
